name: Keep Holding On
description:
Digression and warning. Frame rate low. I had a major issue in the end and could not figure out the error that caused the framerate to go so low.

I ran out of time to make instructions. So, here they are. The controls are in the last screenshot. 

Defend the citizens against 10 waves of enemies.  Each button is one-time use. So keep holding on and don't let go. Prepare for future waves as you upgrade the attacks you have yet to use.

This was my first game jam and it was a blast. Very exhausting while juggle life and family. But overall it was a good learning chance.

If you like my work and want to see more. I have a complete game coming out soon called DunFire VR. All hand-tracking and gesture controls.

DunFire Demo Trailer - YouTube
